tr.td:
Dear: ${customer.companyname},
Thank you for your business!
Your Tricerat maintenance order has been fulfilled for ${salesorder.custbody_end_user} under the Purchase Order ${salesorder.otherrefnum} .
Your new Contract ID is ${salesorder.custbody_contract_name} and provides coverage for the following products:

td.table:
Quantity Item Description License Activation Code
#ITEMLIST#

tr.td:
For information on how to activate your license, please see the attached PDF file.
For general help withconfiguration options, troubleshooting, and more, please go to:
http://www.tricerat.com/tricerat-software-support-center.
Tricerat’s Support is automatically activated the same day licenses are issued. It is good for one year unless otherwise noted. When calling in for support, please have your contract number ${salesorder.custbody_contract_name} ready as this is the easiest way to verify your Support status.
Tricerat Support benefits include:
Toll-free support
Access to web-based support environment
First priority at the support desk
Automatic email notifications for significant product news
Access to all bug fixes, maintenance releases and hot fixes for one calendar year
For Technical Support, please call:
United States and Canada at 800.582.5167
International at +44 1582 638800
Don’t hesitate to let me know if you have any questions or need assistance.
